author: boudoul
body:
as mentioned in this Issue : #26771 (thanks @christopheralanwest , and also @abdoulline , @mazarkin for noticing ) there was a mistake introduced after the 2019-->2021 migration , a file path was incorrect - This PR is fixing this issue.

PR validation:
It should not affect any std WF (where the geometry is read via the DB) , but I ran few events calling explicitely the 2021 XML :
runTheMatrix.py -l 11623 --command '--geometry Extended2021'

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
Backport of the 11_X PR #26856
title: Fix file path forgotten after 2019-->2021 migration (backport)
